meanings.sent1: The dog followed the commands obediently.
meanings.sent2: She always listens obediently to her teacher.
meanings.sent3: The robot vacuum cleaner worked obediently around the house, never complaining.
meanings.sent4: The wind blew the leaves obediently in the direction of the storm.
meanings.sent5: The students lined up obediently, ready for the school assembly.

meanings.definition: In a way that shows compliance or submission
meanings.sent1: He nodded obediently when asked to stay late at work.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers saluted obediently to their commanding officer.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred obediently as it was petted by its owner.
meanings.sent4: The waves crashed obediently against the shore, following the moon's pull.
meanings.sent5: The audience clapped obediently after the performance, showing their appreciation.
